website_summaries.verdict: An incredibly affordable and effective sun hat compared to other models.
pros: Available in a number of different colors
Snaps located on side of hat to hold brim up
cons: Too lightweight and flimsy for some

customer_reviews.title: You try making this for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this on a Granite Mountain hike yesterday for the first time. Glad I chose LG. It does sit down against my crown. The netting clearly ventilates. I have to wonder at some negative reviews here. Really folks? You try making this hat for the price! As someone who sews ... I can tell you it's amazing for the price ... and I don't look like Minnie at last!!! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: crabapple

customer_reviews.title: You get more than what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Remember this is a $9 hat. Now that being said I got this hat for sun protection. I work outdoor all day almost every day. The color has faded ALOT, but it still does its job. I work 6 days a week, 10 to 12 hrs a day, all in the sun. I love this hat and would recomend it to anyone! Does it fade, of yes the color on top of mine is almost gone. Will the buttons rust if wet, well yes but again $9 hat. But will it protect your head and neck all day from the sun YES!
customer_reviews.author: Rush Jeep

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SAFARI HAT
customer_reviews.text: This hat arrived exactly as advertised and exactly what I wanted for a major summer hike. Light weight, the sides are mesh and the top solid. I wear a 7 1/2 and my head measures 22 inches. The large fit almost perfectly. Extra large would have been too loose and the medium probably too tight. I have read a few negative reviews but I found my hat decently constructed, both sides can fold up and snap, and the back flap was evenly cut and of good length. Great sun protector for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RichA

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered extra large, which is a tight fit, but I can live with it. My wife prefers it to other hats I use. Men who are married KNOW what that means! It's machine washable, although the manufacturer doesn't so specify. Great protection from the sun. When it's cold, the neck flap does protect the ears somewhat. When the neck cord and neck flap aren't needed, they tuck away inside the hat. I liked the first one so much I ordered a second for "good."
customer_reviews.author: L. H. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, nicely sewn, looks like it should last a long time. I wear size 7 3/8 so I ordered large and a large is a little bit too big for me. Many people commented that the hat runs smaller but mine certainly did not. With the neck flap tucked in the fit is just about perfect. If you work in the garden, go to air shows or little league games this is a great way to keep the sun off your face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Precision Works Mechanical Electrical

customer_reviews.title: Much better than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Normally I do not write reviews. Recently had facial skin cancer surgery. Needed to protect myself better. I searched on line EVERYWHERE. Finally found this hat. You never can be sure about what things REALLY are like when shopping on line but after research I took a chance. I received my hat very quickly (GREAT). I picked "light brown" and it was "PERFECT" for me. Material, quality and look are just what I wanted. Brim is wide. Back flap is just the right size. Fit couldn't be better. I have told friends about my new hat because I was so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JohnT

customer_reviews.title: Wide Brim Safari Hat
customer_reviews.text: I wish the brim was a little more flexible. It took a little effort to get it to flex and snap on the sides. It would be nice if it was washable also...have not attempted to wash it but I don't think it will come out well. Careful of the webbing in the top. It does not provide much in the way of sun protection but it is very well vented. Overall the hat worked for what I wanted and it was a good price, so it got 4 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Specifications of XL hat
customer_reviews.text: Internal circumference: 24 inches Height: 4 inches Width of brim: 2 5/8 inches Overall length (front to back): 14 3/4 inches Overall width (side to side): 13 1/2 inches Weight: 4.7 ounces Water Resistant? No The inside of the hat is more round than oval - more fit for Charlie Brown than your typical man. It is slowly conforming to my head. The hat is quite stiff, including the brim. After being worn ~20 times it remains stiff. Labels on hat: Style #FB001 65% Cotton 35% Nelon [sic] Size: XL RN# 112001 Made in China
customer_reviews.author: Solon

customer_reviews.title: A bit too tight!
customer_reviews.text: As I feared, this hat was too small for me as I have a large head. However it was not expensive and seems to be of reasonably good quality. My wife saw me opening it and trying it on and took it for herself when I told her it was too small for me. She looks so cute in it that I'm going back and raise my rating to four stars from three. Take care.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby B

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this hat
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hat. It work perfect for what it's designed for. I really like the extra wide brim as well as the rigidness. It keeps my face and neck free from sun. I saw alot of reviews complaining about it I think people expect to much out of a $12 hat. I love this hat.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: PROTECTION from the sun
customer_reviews.text: This hat is everything I love it and everybody I know love it too.thick but not Stiff.
customer_reviews.author: karen glaze

customer_reviews.title: A little tighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: It fits tighter than most XL sized hats I purchase. More like a LG size. There is no way to adjust the fit, and the Neck shade part is permanent and needs to be tucked inside if unwanted and that makes the hat even tighter. Wish it was a bit looser and that it had a detachable neck shade portion. The brim seems like it's going to be wide enough to keep the sun away. I like the color. I'm already getting jabs that I look like Indiana Jones in it, but I don't care as long as I'm not burning at my child's 8 hour swim meets.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Really nice hat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A friend got one of these, and I liked the way it looked. When he told me what he paid, I had to order one for myself. I have a big head, and the extra large fits me perfectly. The wide brim and neck flap help keep me from getting burnt ears and scalp in the hot New Mexico sun. You can tuck the neck flap into the hat if you don't need it. It is relatively stiff material, so I have found it easy to shape it the way I like it. I think it has an "Indiana Jones" look to it, and it seems like it should be pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, so disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Please note these are *Made in China* looked great considering it came in a relatively flat plastic package. It sprang right into shape. Then the smell of cigerettes and fish hits ya. Nope. Not kidding. Washed it in a gentle cycle thinking it would keep it's shape, like most hats do, and guess what? It shrank a full inch all the way around including the neck flap . Also one of the little metal rivetes fell off in the process. (Very thin metal) worst 9 bucks ever spent. Originally purchased this hat for light yard work/gardening. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tran

customer_reviews.title: Functional But Not High Quality
customer_reviews.text: It worked to block the sun on a 10hr hike in South Arizona. For it's low price, it's not a bad deal, however the quality definitely reflects the price. The material and stitching is not great. It will be crushed in the shipping package so you'll likely want to spend some time trying to restore the intended shape. You'll never get all the wrinkles out. If you need a hat quick (with prime shipping) before heading out on a trek under the sun, this will likely meet such an immediate need. I later replaced it with a higher quality hat found in a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W.

customer_reviews.title: Full protection from the suns harmfull rays on your ears and neck...
customer_reviews.text: The wide wrap around brim that provides you with much more shade, and the capability to be able to snap the brim up on the sides (although I do not). I really believe that the head band did not get as wet/sweaty (has vent holes) as when I wore a ball cap. I use it for working outside around the house, while out in my boot fishing, and crabbing, as well as when I am on the beach and boardwalk at the Jersey shore. Should have purchased one thirty years ago...
customer_reviews.author: George F. Walley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great hat for sun protection
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a hat with the cloth at the back to keep from getting his neck sunburned so I purchased this one from Amazon for him for Father's Day. He really likes it and he does wear it a lot on these bright sunny summer days. He even asked me to get him a second one just like it so that he has a back-up in case he forgets the hat at our other property. It seems to be a good fit--got him a large. The neck string kind of bothers him but I told him to simply put it behind his neck when the wind is not blowing. He likes the dark khaki color.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Great for sun and style
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made. Was wrinkly and stiff on arrival, as expected. Soaked the hat in water and dried stiff to my preferred shape. I wanted a stiffish hat, and this fit the bill. I think it has been starched because it became floppy when wet. Almost perfect size, the chart helped. Would recommend for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jwoodrock

customer_reviews.title: It fits well
customer_reviews.text: So this hat fits well on mi enorme cabeza. It is goofy looking and I don't plan on wearing it out. It was perfect for my halloween costume. I mainly wear it now to keep debris off my head(obviously not a hard hat.) I will probably bring it to Costa Rica and/or wear it on hikes, since i already look a hot mess when hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Randomized User #113

customer_reviews.title: I have slghtly smaller than average head, and its too small.
customer_reviews.text: I order a Medium, since My head is relatively narrow (not wide, nor fat, norround) and its pretty tight. Felt like I was wearing a kids or woman's size. I think I had to order and X-Large The Quality feels ok. It is thick 100% cotton material, but that not a good thing. Being thick and 100% just means it will get very hot and absorb all the seat. And if it rains it will just get drencht quickly. Even if it had fitted me well, buying it would have been a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Hat fit to tight to wear comfortably and is not like the one shown in the picture. I wanted a hat where the sides of the brim could be snapped up, which was what the descriptive picture showed. The hat I got did not have the snaps I was expecting. Useless to me. I gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Neck flap and vented top are nice, but brim can’t handle washings without brim becoming floppy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the flap and the mesh. I’ve had three of these. I’ve used these many times on mission trips in the tropics and they keep my neck from getting roasted and the vented top keeps my head moderately cool. The flap can be rolled up and tucked into the top part of the hat if not needed. But the brim is sewn on what I suspect is cardboard, so if you wash it a couple times it turns into a Gilligan style sailors’ floppy hat, see pic. Left is washed many times and floppy, right has never been washed. No worries, floppy is good for beach stiff brim is good for use on riding mower.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great hat for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The hat was exactly what I was expecting. It keeps the sun off my neck on hot sunny days and the mesh top allows for great air flow. The color was a little bit off compared to the picture, but could have been my monitor setting. The actual color was more what I was looking for in any case. Probably purchase a few more as gifts for some family members.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: No more sunburnt neck or ears
customer_reviews.text: The hat is a snug fit on my head, is really light, and does a fine job covering my neck, ears, and forehead from the sun. It is noticeably warmer than wearing a baseball cap style hat but that is still better than a burned neck and ears. I had to switch to using ear plug style hearing protection as even with the cap sides in the up position my ear muff style protection would just crush the top of this hat. I am not sure i would call it a comfortable hat, but it does the job it is intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Dream Master

customer_reviews.title: She passed eagle cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I like the style when I was looking at it online. When I got it the fabric looked really cheap, it felt really cheap and did not look like it was going to hold up for very long. I wouldn’t get this for myself or anyone as a gift. I did give it away because someone said they wanted a hat to do yardwork in. It’s not something I would wear around. The brand is flimsy and the material is really sad. You get what you pay for. You’re better off going to a hat store or paying money for a better product somewhere else. Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, just too big.
customer_reviews.text: The hat is well made. The only reason it is not getting five stars is because it fits way too big. I originally purchased a large hat (my usual size for hats); but it was too big. So, I purchased the medium size. The medium is exactly the same size as the large. In fact the large hat fits inside the medium hat. Other than the size, this is a great hat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My man loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I had to kind of laugh, I purchased this hat for my fiance for our anniversary. It was intended for him to wear on our fishing trips...instead he wears it nearly every single day. I kiddingly call him "Indiana Jones". Needless to say, he absolutely loves it, makes me so happy. the quality is great, the shipping was fast and I am definitely planning on purchasing more from this company. Anything that makes my man that happy is a solid 5-stars to me.
customer_reviews.author: Briana M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold it's shape and is very cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this hat. It should be a $10 hat and doesn't hold its shape. It wrinkles easily. Doesn't provide protection for your forehead. You can see your forehead through the hat mesh and looks ridiculous wish I took a photo before sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: The ELITE

customer_reviews.title: good protection from basal cell carcinoma
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Mojave desert where the solar index is extreme from June through September and you'd rather be hotter under a hat than have your face and neck microwaved. This is rigid enough not to flap in the breeze but not so hard as to be uncomfortable. If you wanted to be inconspicuous, this camo pattern is more adapted to the forest than the desert, but it's stylish. It's got an easy-adjust chinstrap for when the wind is 35 mph and you don't want it swept away. washable like a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph H. Goldsen

customer_reviews.title: Very tight fit for a 23.5" head
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a decent hat, but smaller than I expected. I measured with a soft sewing tape measure, and my head is almost exactly 23.5" around. This hat fits *very* tightly on my head. Good news: it isn't going to blow off in a stiff breeze. I'm hoping that it will stretch out some with use. Time will tell. Also, the neck cover is smaller than I expected. It doesn't keep the back of my neck covered if I look down, and barely comes halfway across my ears. I would have preferred it to be longer and wider.
customer_reviews.author: LinuxChuck

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat could be better
customer_reviews.text: I like the sun protection this hat provides and the ventilation is very good. As others have stated, the neck flap is too big and more than necessary. The neck flap is not removable and there is no means to roll it up. The brim is a little floppy in the wind. Even though it's comfortable at first, when worn for long periods, the band digs into my forehead and leaves me with a red indentation.
customer_reviews.author: ConstantCritic

customer_reviews.title: Card Board Hat
customer_reviews.text: This hat feels like it is made from cardboard. Still it does the job of blocking the direct sun on the neck. I would not buy again knowing that this is really a cheaply made product that one might say is for kid play dress up rather than working in the garden... Why is everything seeming to degrade in quality while going up in price worse than I have seen in 50 years of consumerism.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J. Villines

customer_reviews.title: Smaller fit but good quality
customer_reviews.text: I got the largest size they sell and it was still a little tight, my other complaint is the vent holes on the side rust very quickly. Other then those complaints the product was exactly what I expected. The material is tough but comfortable and can handle plenty of abuse. The brim deforms a little now that I have used it out in the sun and out in the rain, but it easily can be reformed by hand. While I haven't needed to a would assume that you could use steam to get out any extreme deformations in the brim. Would be a 5 star except for the rust and fit issue.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This hat happened to be shipped in a bag and did not appear to be as sturdy, but to my surprise when I took it out of the bag, the coverage was great and the hat had perforated little holes for extra ventilation. The hat also includes buttons and clip on to snap the sides of the hat up and also it includes an extra protection "cape-like" extension to protect your the back of your neck. This hat is a must-have if you hike often or stay outdoors for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Top not creased like pictured
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace an old tattered straw ranch hat, so Ordered this for my father to wear while working on the farm tractor. He really likes it, but stated that the head band area gets a little hot and causes his head to sweat a little, which is why I gave it 4 stars. Also, it doesn’t really hold a crease on top like pictured. It’s more of a round dome head hat. We were looking for a little more cowboy style, but it’s ok as it gets the job done by getting the sun off the face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: P.J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these hats hoping they were going to work out. I wear them outside while working in the yard and also when Kayaking. I love them. I have to put my hair up because of the heat and the hats are very light weight. It has a back neck cover that is great if you are weeding or gardening. This is the second season with them and they still look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality inexpensive hat, should last years!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is very well-made! Heavy material, quality stitching, and the brim is rigid enough to be fully positionable so you can style it like you want to. Although I won't really use them, the snaps are nice and tight and look to be rust-resistant. The neck flap is long enough to cover my neck, but not look like something out of the French Foreign Legion. Love love love this hat! A must for preventing skin cancer high up in our Rocky Mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Backwoods Mister

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described. I have a 23 inch head and got the extra large- it fit nicely (FYI I like a looser fit ) The flap fits into the crown if you want just the hat look but the flap is nice as it covers my neck. The brim also has snaps so you can roll it up. very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: PBR fan

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, sizing leaves little to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Still Love the hat and bought a second, but size and stiffness could be better. I bought X-Large and it was too big, so I bought Large and was way to small looked like a little kids hat on me. So added a little filler strip to the X-Large, returned the Large and still liked it enough to buy another different color. The piece that goes over the neck is a little too stiff and could be a little wider. The rest of the hat is softening to fit, but the neck piece is still little stiffer than prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Jack H

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat be sure to order the next size down
customer_reviews.text: This hat is exactly what I expected and shields me well from the Sun. I ordered medium which is what I usually wear and it was way too big. So I exchanged it for the small one which was also too large. I had to put a cushion all the way around in the lining to make it fit right. That's okay for the price it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Waterickson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fishing, or a safari, or looking for Dr. LIvington while fishing on safari.
customer_reviews.text: This hat was exactly as described, and prevented my bald Irish head and neck from getting sunburned. It fit me a big snugly, but I also have an comically large head, int he Megamind-Gallaxhar range. It is not a high fashion hat. It is a desert hat.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Geary

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight (flimsy) and see-thru.  A little small too.
customer_reviews.text: The hat is a bit more flimsy than I thought it would be, which might be a good thing for those who want a very lightweight hat. The mesh sidewalls of the head piece are very see-through - large holes so your forehead and hair are quite visible, which makes the hat look a little odd to me. Brim is nice and wide, and shades eyes and ears well. Maybe I'll like it more after a few uses, and will update this review accordingly
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Nice hat. It fit as expected. I was disappointed, however, that when it got wet, the shape was totally ruined. If you plan to use this in areas where it won’t be getting wet, it is a great hat. If you are looking for something that can handle getting soaked and hold up, keep looking. To be fair, the description of the hat did not say it was waterproof, hence the 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momma

customer_reviews.title: stinks to high heaven!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves to mow in it, but I have to wash it. It smells so bad! You can not wash out the smell. Believe me, I tried every product out there. If hubby would let me, I'd throw it away (outside) and buy from someone else. He says he doesn't care. I however, will not let him bring it in the house! Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: opinionated

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Keeps sun off head and back of neck well. Breaths so less sweat when working outdoors. Only issue is if you leave string tie loose it alters your view or prospective focus. So when I do not wish to use to keep on if windy I leave loose to have chin barely hold or tuck in back so not much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stc2581

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect sun hat
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best sun hat I have ever owned. Everything about it seems just right - the brim is the right size, provides good shade without being too large, the neck flap covers just what you want, the mesh top keeps everything nice and cool, even the neck lanyard is soft and adjusts easily. You're not going to win any fashion awards wearing it, but if you're going to spend all day in the sun this hat is just about perfect. Great price as well which will make it easy to replace once it gets too sweaty or loses its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lipsett

customer_reviews.title: the shape isn't the same as the picture stated though I can fine with that
customer_reviews.text: After a few washes, the shape isn't the same as the picture stated though I can fine with that. However, after 6th washes, the stitches at the edges starting to falling off. I do not think this hat last another 2 months before it becomes unusable..
customer_reviews.author: K. L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my costume
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to wear for my Halloween costume (Dr. Alan Grant in Jurassic Park). The hat was inexpensive and good quality. I'll probably even wear it around to do yard work so that's a bonus. The neck flap had to be taped up inside the hat so it didn't show for my costume. Not sure if they are all like that or not but it was just a minor inconvenience. Overall, good value for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Hoov

customer_reviews.title: It will shrink if you try to wash it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until I washed it. Washed in cold water and dried on a line, now it's about one half the size it was before! Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the style of the hat
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of the hat, the brim, the neck flap. But the hat was too large for my head size but I suppose if needed I could still wear it over my cap which I have done. I'm not sure if it's policy and or procedure to fold up a hat of this nature and material like a paper airplane to be shipped in a bag since this is my first time ordering this kind of hat but I did find it disappointing to see it crumpled as it was after removing it from the bag. Which I suppose I can understand if it is an effort to be more economical.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: We live in the Ohio Valley, where the heat and humidity can melt you down in a matter of minutes. My husband likes to work outside, and this hat is perfect for mowing lawn or sawing wood. The wide brim and back flat keeps the sun off of his back, and the mesh allows for cool air to flow through. We've had this hat for only a few weeks, but it appears to be really durable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Lion

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver for me on my recent trip to Aruba. The neck flap in the back is why I purchased this hat since I got severely burned earlier in the summer. The mesh is very breathable and let my head cool off despite being in the sun. Great for hiking and for anytime you may find yourself in a desert.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good Quality Inexpensive Hat
customer_reviews.text: This seems to have amazing quality considering the low price. I bought a different hat last year, which was too flimsy and the brim looked too wavy. The brim of this hat (and flap that covers your neck) is stiff enough to hold its shape well. I chose the green camouflage color which has bold colors. The cord stays in place when cinched under my chin. Overall I'm impressed with the quality of this hat for how modestly priced it is.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Size variation between different colors
customer_reviews.text: Ordered both khaki and blue hats, size medium. Both hats are constructed well but fit very differently. My head measured 57cm. The khaki fit well and the blue was much tighter. In spite of this I really like these hats and will be wearing them often
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, terrible brim
customer_reviews.text: My head is pretty big and I have zero success trying to find a good sunhat that will fit. I have about a dozen in my closet, worn once and give me a headache. I bought this hat in XL and it fits my head absolutely perfectly. I usually wear a baseball hat size 7 1/2 or slightly smaller. I can't give it a perfect rating because the brim came creased and mashed. A week later of use and it still looks like a jelly fish and more than one person has called it "ridiculous". I agree. I would be SO HAPPY to have a hat with a nice solid brim. Its actually super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M Ehlers

customer_reviews.title: Hard hat
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered three different hats from different sellers and this one is hard and feels more like a cowboy hat. It's not a wide brim and the backflap is too small. I work outdoors for over 8 hours daily and this hat does not provide the protection I need. The only positive thing may be the material from which this hat is made out of, I will not return the hat because I'll just use it at home, especially in this Southern California weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Image differed from real hat
customer_reviews.text: In the photo it showed a button to bring the sides up as desired. The item I received did not have any such button to pin the sides up. Not a big deal, but an important difference to take note of. Otherwise it's a good product and gets the job done. For the right price it's a good hat to keep the sun away.
customer_reviews.author: Gualterio Hark

customer_reviews.title: mesh's holes are very large and noisy neck flap.
customer_reviews.text: The mesh's holes are very large...so I wonder how bad my forhead will get burned. The fabric is very stiff. The neck flap is very loud sounds like sandpaper over the shirt. Crazy that so many years and they can't improve this model, please use newer fabrics that are quiet and fresh...even with the vents this fabric may be too hot for California's sun.
customer_reviews.author: Bridey D. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Being Charged to Return Their Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: Hat arrived missing snap. Defective and of poor quality. Am told I need to pay return shipping charges even though company sent junk product. Do not order this hat, and unless I am suddenly issued a full refund of all charges, I cannot recommend ordering from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Chil'e

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: JFH Wide Brim Bora Booney Outdoor Safari Summer Hat w/Neck Flap & Sun Protection is versatile in protecting not only the head but also the neck, which is most vulnerable to cancer from sun exposure. It keeps me from profuse sweating while engaged in outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Dr Alan Grant Hat lol
customer_reviews.text: We joke that this hat is the one Dr Alan Grant wore in Jurassic Park #1 & #3 lol Hubby wanted a hat that kept the sun off his neck and it does that! Our oldest son tried taking it so I need to order another one lol IDK about fit, my husband wanted it a tad bigger but really we probably just didn't order the right size, I didn't measure his head...
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 7

customer_reviews.title: Good fishing hat
customer_reviews.text: HTe hat provides good sun protection, is light enough to wear without pressing on the head (I dislike heavy hats), has a snap up feature for "style" if you want, and has a lanyard to tighten up when you are cruising at speed in a boat. Overall, VG
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mesh let's in too much sun
customer_reviews.text: Works great overall, love it and very breathable, was a little large as I expected from sizing chart. Mesh let's in too much sun so you need a bandanna/durag if you have a high forehead like myself. Adding the bandanna made a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: J.Feuling

customer_reviews.title: This hat is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Texas and spend a lot of time in the garden. The summer sun here is intense. This hat is perfect! It protects my head, ears and back of my neck well! It is sturdy and light on the head. The price for this hat is truly a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed hat
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed hat. Fabric is stiff like new Carhart work wear which may prove hot to wear on especially hot days. Other than the stiffness, which may soften with time, it is a great hat that keeps the sun off your ears and back of the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a lightweight hat that you can drench in water and wring out to keep you cool, this isn't it. However, if you want a hat that is well made and rugged, and will keep you protected from the sun, and keep its shape, this is it. More like a stetson than a boonie hat, this is somewhere in between.
customer_reviews.author: Cheap Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Good hat, much smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: My head is 22" circumference; I got a small based on other reviewers' size recommendations and it is verrrry tight. But, I really like the hat itself. I'm returning it and getting one in a medium. I wish the neck flap was removable; it's sewn on. I'll be removing it once I receive the new size.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Henderson

customer_reviews.title: 10 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is a hat of great quality at an unbelievable price. I used the sizing guide and the fit is perfect. It looks BADA*SS and will protect me in the South Carolina sun soon. I love this hat! My wife thinks I'm crazy because I wear it indoors!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Fits small, sizes are not accurate. Hat feels like a cardboard. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OSA

customer_reviews.title: Sun protection ?  What sun protection???
customer_reviews.text: So, I wore this most of the day this past Memorial Day while working in the yard. That same evening, my head was on fire! This hat did absolutely nothing to protect my bald head from getting extremely burnt! DO NOT GET if you need sun protection!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and features
customer_reviews.text: I like this hat. The only thing I wish it had were snaps to flip up the brim. The brim is also hard to shape due to the materials they used. But for $12, I can't complain, and it does its job of sun protection with a stylish look.
customer_reviews.author: To The Point

customer_reviews.title: No more sun burned head, neck, and face.
customer_reviews.text: Followed sizing guide and hat fits perfect. This made yard work, mowing, and cutting firewood much more bearable in the 90 degree temps that we get during late Indiana summers. I bought a second one since the first one worked so well. I alternate them between washings. I have washed both several times and they keep there shape well. I wish the neck cover was just a little longer, but it does the job the way it is. Just keeping the direct sun off my head, face and neck allows me to keep working in the miserable temps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I can't really give a full review as my husband hasn't used it yet; we have yet to try it out on our trip. My husband tried it on and it fit fine, we just agreed that the mesh looked a bit strange, it's hard to see it in the picture. Shipping was fast and it looks pretty sturdy, so we will update the review once we truly try it out!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hat.  Excellent buy !  Have bought many more.
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome hat ! Fit exactly as expected. You should measure the circumference of your noggin, and use the sizing chart. I have a big head, matching my ego, and this hat fit perfect. The hat itself, is super light, and after a few days out of the packaging, it unwrinkled itself. I purchased 7 more of them in different colors. How's that for satisfied ?
customer_reviews.author: T Renovator

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat to use as part of a Halloween costume, so I wasn't expecting it to be great quality. Figured I could use it as a sun hat if it held up, as I do live in a very dry and warm area. I was surprised by the quality of the materials and how nice it looks and fits overall. Happy to have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Size does not match as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this hat from 2 different web sites. The hats do not match the sizes shown. I ordered a medium ( size 7 1/4) ended up too large. I sent it back and ordered a small (7 to 7 1/4 shown). This hat is too large also. Feels like the medium. I am sick and tired of ordering products and send them back because they do not match the information shown. For Amazon, I will send this back nor will I renew my Prime membership because of this and other products that do not match the shown ads.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Good hat with a poor strap fastener
customer_reviews.text: This hat is flexible with a stiff yet flexible brim. Fabric is tough and easy to clean. The strap has a tightener that slips off easily and went missing very early. I use this for kayaking and outdoor activity.
customer_reviews.author: S. Plencner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: very skeptical to purchase online...well, so glad, it's perfect...the color is better than I've found before...high quality, my husband wears it constantly working outside...never falls off, snaps for preferred shaping, & keeps the bugs off his neck, he is Very allergic to mosquitoes, this was a gift for him that exceeded all my expectations...go for it, won't find a better made summer protective hat, & the color!...
customer_reviews.author: Mary from California

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat.  Bought for Burning Man and wore it every day.  Don't wash it in the machine or it will lose its shape
customer_reviews.text: Love this hat. Bought it for Burning Man and wore it every day Lots of sun protection, looks good, and the mesh top is good for ventilation Had another last year and washed it in the machine, where it lost all its shape. Don't do that
customer_reviews.author: RandyCPU

customer_reviews.title: Good protection from the sun.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves working in the garden but he's had skin cancer and has to protect himself from the sun. He also has a large head and has a hard time finding hats that fit. He likes this hat and I like that it protects the back of his neck as well as his head and ears.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen T.

customer_reviews.title: okay but
customer_reviews.text: lightweight, British desert pattern, fits well on my 7 5/8 head, the only complaint is that on mine the neck flap was not sewn on correctly. the flap covers my left ear but my right ear is exposed. It is still functional
customer_reviews.author: Francisco P. what are you talking about?             talking abot

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time out under the sun as a nurseryman. This hat was a great deal at about $5. The fabric is light and semi-breathable. Because the fabric is light, it is not very stiff. I suggest you take some starch and an iron to it.
customer_reviews.author: Zygmunt

customer_reviews.title: Great hat!! Accurate sizing!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7 5/8 to 7 3/4 head depending on the hat. The XL of this hat fits perfect. Just snug enough to stay on without being to tight. Plus the blaze orange camo is great for hunting, so I don't have to wear a vest
customer_reviews.author: Raymundo Montes

customer_reviews.title: Good construction - mesh was a bad choice
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great for the price, burned a nice mesh pattern into my forehead, but that's my fault. Would recommend a solid fabric rather than the mesh version if you're getting this for sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: gift for dad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat as a gift for my dad. He likes that it has a piece of material in the back to keep his neck from getting sunburnt. He said that the fit is great and it provides great shade for when he's out on the tractor. I may purchase him and my husband this hat again, maybe in a couple of different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa H Wood

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head, but I should be on the smaller side of XL based on measurements. Instead XL is very snug with very little stretch to it. Also, note that the neck flap doesn't have a pocket to roll it into. Otherwise great quality/value.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great hat !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hat fit great on my giant head. Also worked awesome at keeping the sun off of my neck and ears. When I didn’t want the neck drape showing I stuffed in the hat and it disappeared. Only complain was the one snap didn’t work on the side but I’m not trying to look like Crocodile Dundee any way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Non symmetrical. The neck protecting fabric is sewn off center so extends past the chin strap on one side but just about up to it on the other. Very firm brim... thinking about soaking or spraying with water or fabric softener. Overall did like the style but you can see where costs were cut. Not sure if I'd purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Colavito

customer_reviews.title: ... got really hot because the fabric doesn't breathe that easily so I would recommend trying the mesh version
customer_reviews.text: Top of my head got really hot because the fabric doesn't breathe that easily so I would recommend trying the mesh version. That said, this kept the sun off my neck and face and rain from my glasses (not waterproof). Wrap a mosquito net around your head and you can still comfortably walk and talk while laughing at your companions for not having one. Cinch is a cheap piece of plastic and is held in by a small knot so keep in mind you might lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Material is good, but the build is quite bad
customer_reviews.text: Material is good, but the build is quite bad. E.g., grommets in my copy are not in the proper place, won't even latch. Everything seems misaligned, uncentered. Will work for its purpose though, which is camping trips and fishing, not a fashion show.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.

customer_reviews.title: HIgh quality, low price.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot take sun, and am retired, living and doing hard farm work in a tropical climate. The mesh around the sides of the head keeps it much cooler than the hats I had been using. This hat also has a much stiffer brim. I sweat profusely, and after a couple hours of that, my other hats would flop at the brim, obstructing my vision. It also reduces the surface area of the brim, defeating it's sun blocking capabilities. I am DEFINITELY ordering more of these at some point in the fairly near future.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Works great, brim just doesn't hold structural shape.
customer_reviews.text: This hat is very comfortable, light weight and really helps in the hot sun to keep you cool. My only downside is after 2 months of daily constant use at work the brim did not hold its shape. It started to get very wavy and a little floppy.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: not good quality
customer_reviews.text: this was not vented on the sides like the picture showed. Bought for a friend and they hated it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain hat
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this hat. I got if for my husband for father’s day, he really enjoyed it and its a great value for a “first hat” or one that won’t see daily use. It’s great, we just don’t know yet if it’ll hold up to heavy use. Also the neck flap is a bit annoying, but hey if you really hate it cut it off. Still a good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have a community garden that is about 2 acres and there is nowhere to hide form the sun. This hat works even better than expected. It fits perfectly even when I put the neck flap up inside of it. It seems to be well ventilated, as my head stays cool and I sweat less. I've had it for about 3 weeks and I where it at least 3 hours a day. It seems to be holding up well, I'll report back in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: William Dansby

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT AT THE RIGHT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE IT BECAUSE IT LETS AIR BREATH THROUGH MY HEAD AND KEEPS THE SUN OUT OF NECK AND FACE.... USE IT WHILE WORKING AROUND THE HOUSE AND YARD, EITHER CUTTING GRASS WITH THE TRACTOR OR PLANTING TREES.., LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: jose r cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor work
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of work on our lawn and gardens, as well as some outdoor projects like a firepit and a pergola. This hat is a must for me, since I sunburn quite easily. Great hat!
customer_reviews.author: jchausmann

customer_reviews.title: The hat is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I’m liking the hat very much! Most of the time I don’t want the neck flap, so I easily tuck it inside the hat. Same thing for the Chin strap, but that’s very rare.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Orangeatillahut can now be captured!
customer_reviews.text: I was on a stroll among some very orange jungles and thought I could improve my camouflage so as not to stand out. I do so wish to see an Orangeatillahut, so rare, and easily frightened. In purchasing this item, I can convincingly blend into that background. Alas, yet another hunt is on to photograph that rarest Orangeatillahut that has been haunting my dreams. (the hat fit appropriately, blocks the sun, and as a hiker, the local hunters can clearly see me)
customer_reviews.author: NJB

customer_reviews.title: Love the design of the hat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my job. I am a A/C technician in a desert area that works outdoor. It is very important to wear hat while I am working, otherwise the skin of my neck would burn. Love the design of the hat, it allows air goes in and out of the hat. If the material can be softer the better.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Shie

product_meta.title: Wide Brim Outdoor Safari Summer Sun Hat with Neck Flap
feature_bullets: SOLID CROWN: Solid crown for blocking sunlight

TIMELESSLY RUGGED: The hat is equally at home on that annual camping trip as it is at your backyard BBQ. These colors and configurations are classically styled, and provide a style statement while maintaining its functionality.

HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS & HAND CRAFTED DURABILITY: Imported 60% Cotton & 40% Polyester Blend will ensure efficient moisture wicking, while maintaining hat crown shape. This outdoors piece is crafted to outlast!

HIGH FUNCTIONALITY: Three Inch brim ensure a high level of sun protection, providing shade for where it counts. Neck Flap takes protection one step further by protecting neck from the elements. The 4.5” high mesh/solid crown ensures a generous fit profile for most heads while providing for excellent ventilation and sweat wicking. Chinstrap with Cordlock ensures that the hat stays firmly planted on your head. Sizing Available in Small (7 1/8") Medium (7 1/4") Large (7 1/2") & XL (7 5/8").
